titleStmt.title: Anno fœlicissimi regni augustæ reginæ nostræ Elizabeth quadragesimo primo, fauste[m?] iam incepto psal. terseptimus, domine in virtute tua : this sallm blessed David did make for himself & his peple ...
titleStmt.author: Patten, W.
Campen, Jan van, 1490-1538.

notesStmt.note: Includes Latin prose and English verse in two columns.
Part of title from first line of text.
At head of Latin text: Ex versione Io. Campensis.
Attributed to W. Patten by STC (2nd ed.).
Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Jesus College (University of Cambridge). Library.
